title: Calories in a Shot of Whisky
meta_description: Discover calories in shot of whisky, including alcohol content, zero carbs or fat, and variations like double pours or mixers.
h1: Calories in a Shot of Whisky
assumptions: Standard 1.5 fl oz (44 ml) serving of 80-proof (40% ABV) straight whisky, no mixers or ice.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, serving size, and any added mixers. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard shot of whisky has about 97 calories, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add cola mixer (1.5 fl oz shot + 4 oz cola)

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of whisky?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 kcal for a standard 1.5 fl oz shot of 80-proof whisky.

faqs.q: Does whisky have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Straight whisky has 0 g carbs, fiber, and sugars—all calories come from alcohol.

faqs.q: What about calories in whisky on the rocks?
faqs.a: Same as straight (97 kcal); ice adds no calories but may dilute slightly when melting.

faqs.q: How does proof affect calories in a shot of whisky?
faqs.a: Higher proof means more alcohol and calories—e.g., 100-proof adds ~20 kcal per shot.

faqs.q: Are there any nutrients besides calories in whisky?
faqs.a: Minimal; 0 g protein, fat, cholesterol, or sodium in straight whisky.
